General.Name: Sekar Bumi Tbk
General.Description: PT Sekar Bumi Tbk produces and sells frozen food products in Indonesia. The company offers frozen food products comprising of dim sum, fish balls, breaded shrimps, and sausages. It also produces shrimp, fish feed, and cashew nuts. In addition, the company offers squid balls, fish tofu, fish rolls, mini wonton, crispy seafood money bag, spring rolls, and samosa. Further, it is involved in crops, farm, agriculture, fisheries, construction, marine, and land fisheries processing business, as well as construction, printing, and workshop businesses. PT Sekar Bumi Tbk sells its products under the FINNA, SKB, Bumifood, and Mitraku brands. The company exports its products to the United States, Europe, Japan, South Korea, and other Asian countries. PT Sekar Bumi Tbk was founded in 1968 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.

8.Name: Mr. Howard Ken Lukmito
8.Title: Marketing & Bus. Devel. Director and Director
